OOC (If she doesn't know then hows she know she's out of range?)

Phobia lowers himself down the side of the ship keeping at least one 
eye on KitKats location at all times. he reaches the ground and 
adresses the shebott "You have nothing to fear from me, you can come 
closer." He realized they must be short handed since they only sent 
one bot to investagate. "It would be to my disadvantage to harm you 
since I'm still in range of your bases autoguns. Besides why would I 
come here to pledge my loyalty to your boss. if I were to harm you.---
I'D NEVER GET THE CHANCE." His eyes remained focused on where the 
ships scans showed her to be. "Now if you will radio back to your 
commander you can claim credit for this encounter and leave Dark 
Mouse to answer the phones."

In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> OOC:( It's a strange ship.  How would she know it didn't have 
> autoguns?)
> 
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She called from where she stood.
> "I am KitKat. I was sent from the Pred base to talk to you at your 
> request."
> 
> She still kept her gun ready.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > (FYI my ship doesn't have autoguns.)
> > 
> > Phobia slipped out the top hatch to avoid being seen, His spider 
> mode 
> > pulled the large decimator rifles behind him. "Computer scan area"
> > 
> > The computers voice replied back almost instantly, "Scan 
complete, 
> 1 
> > cybertronian lifeform detected."
> > 
> > "Then I won't be needing this," he lowered one rifle back inside 
> the 
> > ship.
> > 
> > He looked over the side towards where the scans showed Kit Kat 
> (Gimme 
> > a break, sorry couldn't resist) He transformed to robot and held 
> his 
> > rifle at shoulders height."State your name and function 
stranger." 
> He 
> > knew where she was, she probably knew where he was. It was only 
his 
> > advantage if she knew about the weapon he held.
> >
